award_title: EPSCoR CREST Phase I: Center for Post-Transcriptional Regulation
subject: multiomic pipelines that only run in your exact environment
body:
Integrating RNA-seq, metabolomics, and ML into one pipeline is brutalâ€”different tools, dependencies, data formats. Everything breaks when someone tries to reproduce it.

I'm building Ouro to turn published methods into callable infrastructure, so others can use your approach without rebuilding from scratch.

Open to chatting in the new year?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
